snippet.title: The Slaughtering Grounds Review - Worth a Buy?
snippet.description:
The game that almost broke my bell!

The Slaughtering Grounds delivers a constant intense experience while tossing in comical use of excessive physics and blood for those Laugh out loud moments. Never a shortage of zombies to slay and random events are happening all the time. Play single player or 64 player arena FFA's. - Is it Worth a Buy?

Steam Store:
Nope, never, nothing to see here, move along, not having it :p

My Other Channel
https://www.youtube.com/Mackscorner
